DialogueNodes.Text: You're actually here!

Responses.Text: Yes, you wanted me to meet Daphne.
I wanted to see if you'd reconsider coming home with me?

DialogueNodes.Text: Oh, I'm so happy that you're here. This is gonna be great, you'll see!

Responses.Text: Yes, she seems very nice.

DialogueNodes.Text: I don't want to leave, I like it here.

Responses.Text: I know, but don't you remember how good it used to be?

DialogueNodes.Text: I like it here, can't we just stay here and be happy?

Responses.Text: I know, but don't you remember how good it used to be?

DialogueNodes.Text: I remember! Oh Sis! Let's get out of here!
You're actually here!

Responses.Text: Yes, you wanted me to meet Daphne.
I wanted to see if you'd reconsider coming home with me?

DialogueNodes.Text: Oh, I'm so happy that you're here. This is gonna be great, you'll see!

Responses.Text: Yes, she seems very nice.

DialogueNodes.Text: I don't want to leave, I like it here.

Responses.Text: Will you let me go then?

DialogueNodes.Text: I like it here, can't we just stay here and be happy?

Responses.Text: I know, but don't you remember how good it used to be?

DialogueNodes.Text: If you wan't to leave I wont stop you.
Sis... I can't go with you, I don't want to. But I won't stop you from leaving...
You're actually here.

Responses.Text: Yes, you wanted me to meet Daphne.
I wanted to see if you'd reconsider coming home with me?

DialogueNodes.Text: I did. I like it here, I hoped you'd like it too. I want us to stay here.

Responses.Text: I know, but don't you remember how good it used to be?

DialogueNodes.Text: I don't want to leave, I like it here.

Responses.Text: Will you let me go then?

DialogueNodes.Text: No, I don't, but I remember Father abandoning us here, I'm just making the best of the situation.

Responses.Text: Will you let me go then?

DialogueNodes.Text: I can't do that... It's for your own good Sis.
Sis... You're here...

Responses.Text: Hans, I've come to take you home.

DialogueNodes.Text: No! Stop it! You're ruining everything!

Responses.Text: Don't you remember how good it used to be?
Why can't you see what she's doing to you!?

DialogueNodes.Text: I don't want to go back to the way it was! Father doesn't want us, Daphne does!

Responses.Text: He does! I promise you that he does.
Suit yourself, I'm leaving!

DialogueNodes.Text: I HATE YOU! YOU'RE RUINING EVERYTHING! DAPHNE WARNED ME THAT YOU WOULD DO THIS!

Responses.Text: HANS STOP! YOU DON'T KNOW WHAT YOU'RE SAYING, JUST LET ME GO!

DialogueNodes.Text: You can't leave, You can't leave me ever again!
THERE'S ONLY ONE DOOR YOU'LL LEAVE THROUGH AND IT'S NOT THE FRONT DOOR!!!
